Course Objective
This course aims to familiarize students with the MLA style of research paper writing (MLA style for documentation is widely used in the humanities, especially in writing on language and literature). Students will learn how to select a topic, conduct research compile a working bibliography, evaluate sources, take notes, outline their projects, and write drafts. Moreover, they will learn how to cite various forms of publications and prepare the list of works cited, how to cite sources in the text, and how to use abbreviations in research papers.
